alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Lee; Leslie; Owsley; Perry; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 28 at 8:23PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF LEE...BREATHITT... PERRY...OWSLEY...WOLFE...AND LESLIE COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 822 PM EST, a band of heavy snow was along a line extending from Baptist to near Hazard and moving south at 15 MPH. THIS BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL BE NEAR... Hazard, Bulan, Toulouse and Mosley Bend around 830 PM EST. Vada and Moct around 850 PM EST. Taulbee and Primrose around 855 PM EST. Frozen Creek, Fivemile, Keck, Canyon Falls and Monica around 905 PM EST. Tallega around 910 PM EST. Jackson, Gentry, Elkatawa, Oakdale and Athol around 915 PM EST. Yeadon, Chenowee and Noctor around 920 PM EST. Copebranch and Inverness around 925 PM EST. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this band of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&

area.areaDesc: Breathitt; Lee; Leslie; Owsley; Perry; Wolfe
